Society

  • Society
    19.02.2024 12:06
    The Krasnodar municipal pharmacy network will remain State-owned.
    On 19 February, the Governor of the Krasnodar province of Veniamin Kondratiev instructed the transfer of all the pharmacies of the ICP " Krasnodar City Pharmacy " to the Cubanfarmation. At the same time, the reorganization will be completely undetectable for visitors. The pharmacies will be routinely operated, without change, will continue to provide preferential medicines, in full and at the same addresses. All staff of the pharmacy network also retain
  • Society
    19.02.2024 11:33
    Transport on the Crimean Bridge temporarily closed
    On 19 February, a report was received on the closing of traffic on the Crimean Bridge at 10:52, " Road traffic on the Crimean Bridge is temporarily closed. On the bridge and in the search zone, we are requested to remain calm and follow the instructions of transport security personnel. " The message of Telegram-Canal, Crime Bridge: Operational Information " , is contained in the message. Read: The movement on the Crimean Bridge was suspended twice on 16 February.
  • Society
    19.02.2024 11:27
    Provide free travel to many children ' s parents was offered to Cuba
    Such an initiative was launched during a round table with the Alliance of Multi-Child Families of the Cuban Family and the head of the Charitable Foundation for the Children of Good Yana Storoduk. The head of the fund noted that the public policy was now aimed at childbearing, and many dominance measures had been introduced for large families. " I am confident that the declared 2024 Year of the Family and the unprecedented support measures will be a positive development.
  • Society
    19.02.2024 11:16
    Legendary The Summer Theatre 1937 will be updated in Sochi
    In 2023, Frunze's park at the Summer Theatre benefited from the resort. This year, they plan to update the event site itself. The reconstruction will preserve all historical and architectural features. The main objective of the project is the technical re-engineering: plans to renovate the roof, to replace communications, to make a modern mechanized stage with light- and project screens. For viewers, additional ventilation and
  • Society
    19.02.2024 10:45
    Condance: In Cuba, 507 educational facilities will be completed this year
    The Governor of the Krasnodar province of Veniamin Kondratyev said that the region had been working extensively on the construction of new schools and the rehabilitation of existing educational institutions. According to the head of Cuba, repairs have been carried out, including in schools with a 100-year history. Thus, school No. 10 of the Pavlov district, which first opened its doors for students 120 years ago, has already started.
  • Society
    19.02.2024 10:19
    The new shore will be set up in the Kudepsta neighbourhood in Sochi.
    The pavement and the lawn have already been installed in parts of the Territory, street furniture has been installed and servitudes have been secured. A single savings will provide comfort in access to social facilities under construction near the Flora, Lestoria and the Letsni. " In the course of the examination, the need to extend the coast downwards/d to the station is almost 1 km. We'll find a solution to complete the renovation.
  • Society
    19.02.2024 09:06
    Krasnodar became the leader of the rating on the construction of flats in Russia at the beginning of the year.
    The Krasnodar is leading Russian cities in the construction of housing per person. More than 5 square metres of housing are currently being built on every citizen of the province of the capital, as described in the study. The experts link the fastest development of the Cuban capital with its favourable climate and proximity to the sea. According to the ratings, at the beginning of 2024, 6 million square kilometres are built in Krasnodar.
  • Society
    19.02.2024 09:01
    Humanitarian assistance for SVO fighters was handed over to Kazaki from Timashev district
    The guys from the Timashev Kazeki Corps were very active in gathering parcels on the front. For example, BARC-16 troops were transported by drones with night vision, sleeping bags, disguise networks, candles, personal hygiene equipment, foods and children ' s letters to SVO. The soldiers appreciated the gifts and thanked the Folks for their support and care. Read also: in the Belorechen region
  • Society
    19.02.2024 09:01
    In the Hutor Belik Slavan district, the park was rebuilt by a Nazi project.
    The Green Zone in the Guardian Alley was updated on the Zille and Urban Environment project. The area was transformed: there was a pavement, a playground, a sports zone and street tracks. " Our people, we are all very happy. Work is under way to improve, for example, to equip shops where it was not sufficient, and the administrator of the Hutora, Belik Vladimir Yeremin, has said.
  • Society
    19.02.2024 07:32
    Bakers from Novorossia travelled 1,800 kilometres to participate in ice races
    Previously, athlete Sergei Guardin became a record of Russia and the world, traveling over 12.5 thousand km to Magadan to participate in the Golden Colum Motoprobe. This time, Sergei Guardin and his second pilot, Alexei Osipenko, took part in the Snow Dogs International Motorate, during which an ice competition took place. New Russians were riding on a motorcycle to the place
